topics.body:
Found specifics on the Gavan/Robocop thing.

"Back in early-to-mid '80s, I was trading videos with Japanese fans, and I showed GAVAN to everyone, and even at conventions. I also made copies for people, including a guy named Steve Wang, who loved the stunt choreography in the show. When he moved to LA, he would show some of his fellow special makeup effects folks the videos I made him, including one Rob Bottin, who took to the design of Gavan. And the rest is history."
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
Dinobot is a dark horse

Tarantulas is a sadistic mad scientist with some rape allegory thrown in.

Black Arachnia is damaged as a result 

Silverbolt is the ultimate white knight

Megatron goes from being generic cartoon bad guy to genuine motherfucker

Optimus is the ultimate good even if a little naive

Terrasaur was Starscream with a different name.

The aliens are a decent use of deus ex machina

This was a good show.

topics.body:
Random fact time!
Mainframe, the studio who animated reboot, beast wars and other early cgi tv shows also animated the music video for "money for nothing.":http://youtu.be/lAD6Obi7Cag
They later had the characters from the music video in "an episode of reboot":http://youtu.be/_WBCZ-11VWk
